articles.description: In the new season of “The Crown,” Gillian Anderson takes on the role of the “Iron Lady.” She’s just the latest in a long line of Thatcher impersonators.

articles.description: Jean Trebek has spoken out after her husband, Jeopardy! host Alex Trebek, died on Sunday following his fight with cancer. See her heartfelt thanks to fans below.
